atk-abh02a12:2_3: Etā hi ārammaṇavasena appamāṇe vā satte pharanti,
atk-abh02a12:2_4: ekasattampi vā anavasesapharaṇavasena pharantīti pharaṇaappamāṇavasena appamaññāyoti vuccanti.
atk-abh02a12:2_12: Tathā dutiyanti yathā puratthimādīsu disāsu yaṁ kiñci ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
atk-abh02a12:2_13: tatheva tadanantaraṁ dutiyaṁ tatiyaṁ catutthañcāti attho.
atk-abh02a12:3_0: Iti uddhanti teneva ca nayena uparimaṁ disanti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a12:3_4: Evaṁ sabbadisāsu assamaṇḍale assamiva mettāsahagataṁ cittaṁ sāretipi paccāsāretipīti ettāvatā ekamekaṁ
atk-abh02a12:3_8: Sabbattatāyāti sabbesu hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhamittasapattamajjhattādippabhedesu attatāya ‘ayaṁ parasatto’ti vibhāgaṁ akatvā attasamatāyāti vuttaṁ hoti;
atk-abh02a12:3_9: atha vā sabbattatāyāti sabbena cittabhāvena īsakampi bahi avikkhipamānoti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a12:4_1: Yasmā vā ettha odhiso pharaṇe viya puna ‘tathā’saddo ‘iti’saddo vā na vutto,
atk-abh02a12:4_4: Vipulenāti ettha ca pharaṇavasena vipulatā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-abh02a12:4_11: Ayaṁ tāva ‘‘mettāsahagatena cetasā’’tiādinā nayena ṭhapitāya mātikāya attho.
atk-abh02a12:5_4: tattha yasmā idaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ dosacaritassa sappāyaṁ,
atk-abh02a12:5_5: tasmā yathārūpe puggale ayaṁ mettā appanaṁ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh02a12:5_6: taṁ mettāya vatthubhūtaṁ puggalaṁ tāva dassetuṁ seyyathāpi nāma ekaṁ puggalantiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a12:5_11: Tattha pubbeva sannivāsena paccuppannahitena vā piyo nāma hoti,
atk-abh02a12:5_15: Yasmā cettha piyatāya imassa byāpādassa pahānaṁ hoti,
atk-abh02a12:5_20: tasmā taṁ upamaṁ katvā idaṁ vuttaṁ –
atk-abh02a12:5_23: tasmiṁ puggale mettaṁ kareyya pavatteyyāti attho.
atk-abh02a12:5_24: Evamevasabbe satteti yathā piyaṁ puggalaṁ mettāyeyya,
atk-abh02a12:5_25: evaṁ tasmiṁ puggale appanāppattāya vasībhāvaṁ upagatāya mettāya majjhattaverisaṅkhātepi sabbe satte anukkamena pharatīti attho.
atk-abh02a12:6_0: 644.Vidisaṁ vāti padaṁ tiriyaṁ vāti etassa atthavibhāvanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a12:7_2: yathā muttaṁ sumuttaṁ hoti suppasāritaṁ suvitthataṁ tathā muñcitvāti attho.
atk-abh02a12:8_1: tasmā nesaṁ ekatova atthaṁ dassetuṁ sabbena sabbantiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a12:9_0: 650.Vipulādiniddese yasmā yaṁ appanāppattaṁ hutvā anantasattapharaṇavasena vipulaṁ,
atk-abh02a12:9_11: Apicettha heṭṭhimaṁ heṭṭhimaṁ padaṁ uparimassa uparimassa,
atk-abh02a12:9_12: uparimaṁ vā uparimaṁ heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa atthotipi veditabbo.
atk-abh02a12:10_0: 653.Seyyathāpi nāma ekaṁ puggalaṁ duggataṁ durupetanti idampi karuṇāya vatthubhūtaṁ puggalaṁ dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a12:10_4: Gatikulabhogādivasena vā tamabhāve ṭhito puggalo duggato,
atk-abh02a12:10_5: kāyaduccaritādīhi upetattā tamaparāyaṇabhāve ṭhito durupetoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a12:11_0: 663.Ekaṁ puggalaṁ piyaṁ manāpanti idampi muditāya vatthubhūtaṁ puggalaṁ dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a12:11_2: kāyasucaritādīhi upetattā jotiparāyaṇabhāve ṭhito manāpoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a12:12_0: 673.Neva manāpaṁ na amanāpanti idampi upekkhāya vatthubhūtaṁ puggalaṁ dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a12:12_5: Bhāvanāvidhānampi etesaṁ kammaṭṭhānānaṁ visuddhimagge vitthārato kathitamevāti.
atk-abh02a12:15_0: Abhidhammabhājanīyaṁ kusalatopi vipākatopi kiriyatopi heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe bhājitanayeneva bhājitaṁ.
atk-abh02a12:17_1: Ārammaṇattikesu pana sabbāpi tīsu tikesu navatabbārammaṇā eva.
atk-abh02a12:17_3: Imasmiṁ pana appamaññāvibhaṅge sammāsambuddhena suttantabhājanīyepi lokiyā eva appamaññāyo kathitā,
atk-abh02a12:17_5: Tayopi hi ete nayā lokiyattā ekaparicchedā eva.
atk-abh02a12:17_6: Evamayaṁ appamaññāvibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṁ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
